name: writeHEIFRepresentation(of:to:format:colorSpace:options:)
desc: Renders the image and exports the resulting image data as a file in HEIF format.
declaration:
func writeHEIFRepresentation(of image: CIImage, 
                          to url: URL, 
                      format: CIFormat, 
                  colorSpace: CGColorSpace, 
                     options: [CIImageRepresentationOption : Any] = [:]) throws
